mulya karanaya, rakshanaya, saha depala jawaram ansha wisin jananaya kerunu daladeshiya nishpadithaye panguwa, 1970 ganan waladi siyayata 30s gananaka mattame pawathini. 2000 wanawita siyayata 70 dakwa ihala nagunu eya 2010 wanawita siyayata 90 dakwa ma wadiwi giyeya. 1990 ganan wala athiwu kotas welandapala uthpathayata, amarikanu fedaral risaw (maha) bankuwa adu poli sahitha naya dima magin kondesi sakasa duni.

shri lankawe wishwa widyala 16k thiyenawa.eeta amatharawa wiwidhakaraye upadhi pirinamana aayathana 15k thiyenawa.oonema nam methanin bala gannako ee monawada kiyala.(wikipidiya pituwata)ithin shri lankawe shishya prajawa a.po.sa sa.pe/u.pe ehema samathwela athi haki widihata oya usas adhyapana aayathana walata athul wela,ehema naththanam rata rajjayakata mangachchala upadhiyak mandu kora gannawa.kamak na.ugathamana shilpayamayi mathu rakena ne.dan api ape mathrukawata haremu.

rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe ada pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemin ohu me bawa kiya sitiya.me athara ada madhyama rathriye mathiwarana pracharaka katayuthu awasan wimen pasu samaja madhya osse sidukarana prachara sambandhayen awadhanaya yomu kara athi bawada komisame sabhapathiwaraya ehidi sandahan kala.gam mattamin idikara athi mathiwarana karyalawala nama puwaru ada madhyama rathriye sita iwath kala yuthu bawath, karyala anidda sita iwath kala yuthu bawath ohu kiya sitiya.emenma mewara mathiwaranaye wiyadama ihala yame awadanamakda pawathina bawayi komisame sabhapathiwaraya wadiduratath sandahan kale.

ekala herod theme shasthrawanthayin wisin thama rawatanu labu bawa daka,athishayin udahas wiya.ewita ohu shasthrawanthayingen wimasa,hariyakara danagath kalaya anuwa,dawurudu wayas wuda,eeta bala wuda,bethlehema ha ee awata siyalu pirimi daruwan mara damimata ana kaleya.thama pawule aarakshawa sandaha misarayata pala yana lesa josap hata sihinayakin danwana ladi.[19]subharanchiye mema pala yama "misarayen mage puthraya kandawa gathimi.[20]" diwasi wakiya itu wima lesa salakayi.meya mosasge nayakathwaya yatathe hebrawwarun eejipthuwen pitathwime siddhiya sandaha yomuwak se salakayi.emanisa mema pataya mathew thuman wisin jesuswahansege jiwithaya judew kathawe punarawarjanayak lesa daka athi athara judayawa eejipthuwa nirupanaya karana athara herod,parawo nirupanaya karayi.[21]herod miya giya pasu josap saha ema pawula eejipthuwen perala pamina[22] galilaye nasareth nuwara padanchi wiya.[23]
